question: Rani Abbakka Chowta of Ullal was a 16th-century warrior queen of coastal Karnataka near Mangaluru. She fought against which colonial foreign power?
explanation: Rani Abbakka Chowta was the first Tuluva Queen of Ullal who fought the Portuguese in the latter half of the 16th century. She belonged to the Chowta dynasty who ruled over parts of coastal Karnataka (Tulu Nadu), India.
